text: Location of Madhya Pradesh The following outline is provided as an overview of and topical guide to Madhya Pradesh: Madhya Pradesh - meaning "Central Province", is a state in central India. Its capital is Bhopal and the largest city is Indore. Nicknamed the "heart of India" due to its geographical location in India, Madhya Pradesh is the second-largest state in the country by area. Rich in mineral resources, MP has the largest reserves of diamond and copper in India. == General reference == === Names === * Common English name: Madhya Pradesh ** Pronunciation: , * Official English name(s): Madhya Pradesh * Nickname(s): * Adjectival(s): Madhya Pradeshi * Demonym(s): Madhya Pradeshis === Rankings (amongst India's states) === * by population: 5th * by area (2011 census): 2nd * by crime rate (2015): 2nd * by gross domestic product (GDP) (2014): 9th *by Human Development Index (HDI): *by life expectancy at birth: *by literacy rate: == Geography of Madhya Pradesh ==
